description.black-white:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances
and flaps its wings. It may also
raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
description.black-2-white-2:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances
and flaps its wings. It may also
raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
description.x-y:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances
and flaps its wings. This may also
raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances
and flaps its wings. This may also
raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
description.sun-moon:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its
wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its
wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its
wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
description.sword-shield:
Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by
dancing and flapping its wings. This may also raise the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
